plot: Miyeon is living with her old father-in-law and her deaf son since her husband has died five years ago. Her life was totally tedious, but one day, Noise from her neighbor gets on her nerves...
title: Mil-cheong
plot_es: Miyeon is living with her old father-in-law and her deaf son since her husband has died five years ago. Her life was totally tedious, but one day, Noise from her neighbor gets on her nerves...
